response.overview: Tyler Wiggins is an average 17-year-old high school student. When a wave of radiation passes the city, Tyler discovers that he, and many others, have been given superhuman powers. With his new teleportation abilities, Tyler and his friend Josh investigate the strange phenomenons that occur after the incident. Tyler must learn to control his powers and carry the responsibilities that come with them while also protecting the ones he loves. However, everything comes with a cost.
response.title: Transference
